main event: A bright white light, described as several dime-sized objects in close formation, was observed moving across the sky in Norfolk, Virginia.
interesting points: The objects appeared to move from north to south, with one larger object moving from south to north.
The objects disappeared instantly as they moved across the sky.
The objects were observed and disappeared at intervals within two to three seconds.
No unusual activity was reported by the local naval air station or air traffic control.
The sighting may have been caused by a meteorological condition, such as a temperature inversion, that was observed in the area.
sighted object: Bright white lights described as several dime-sized objects in close formation
